meta.name: VASTU Kitchen Rules
meta.notes: Kitchen standards expressed as metric constants + simple formulas. Removed dining-room furniture, clearances, and scores mistakenly inserted. Unified file merged from v0.2.0 (core), v0.3.0 (appliance dims + kitchen layouts), v0.4.0 (cabinets + laundry), and v0.5.0 (laundry clearances/layouts). Units in meters unless otherwise noted.

anthro.note: From reach/visibility and comfortable heights; use for reach checks + UI hints.

broken_U.description: U-shaped interrupted by an opening or passage (Fig.9).

L_shape.description: L-shaped with clear flow and landing zones (Fig.10).

wall_oven_plans.description: Plans demonstrating wall ovens within L or corridor kitchens (Fig.11).
wall_oven_plans.notes: Dining proximity shown; keep landing near ovens.

cabinet_sink_standard.notes: All cabinet sinks 36 in high; backsplash varies 3–4 in.

ledge_and_flat_rim_bowls.rim_note: Flat-rim bowls typically have 1–1.5 in rim on all sides.

freestanding.notes: Fits standard base cabinets; front or top loading variants.

surface_cooking_units_electric.notes: Built-in installations; allow extra space if controls are remote.

wall_ovens.text_note: Microwaves available in same sizes or as combos with regular ovens; some horizontal or vertical doors; some with viewing panels.

ranges_gas.note: 40-in ranges generally have two ovens; 20- and 30-in ranges one oven.

built_in_under_counter.note: Allowance required at top/sides for air grille.

built_in_freezer.note: May be under counter, stacked with refrigerator, or wall-hung.

built_in_refrigerator_freezer.note: Example model: 24 in deep, 36 in wide, 74 in high (≈13 cu ft).

rows_in.features: 4-burner range, oven, broiler, refrigerator, single sink
3-burner range, oven, broiler, refrigerator, double sink
3-burner range, single sink, refrigerator, storage space

features: 2-burner range, oven, broiler, refrigerator, single sink
3-burner range, oven, broiler, refrigerator, single sink
up to 4-burner range, oven, broiler, refrigerator, single sink
4-burner range, oven, broiler, refrigerator, single sink

automatic_appliance_center.notes: Wall/cabinet built-in; some with receptacles, retractable cords, breakers, clocks, timers.

shared_standards.notes: Manufacturers vary; confirm exact SKU sizes.

metal.color_options: stock + special order; some with wood doors

range_ventilator_cabinet.projection_note: Some models have no projecting hood

planning_text_notes.location_pref: Near kitchen/bath/utility; dry, heated, well-lighted; ventilate for moisture/odors.
planning_text_notes.accessibility: Provide electrical outlets; arrange for flow of work; provide storage and ironing needs.
flow_of_work_order: ironing board or ironer (and standing/hanging area)

matched_washer_and_dryer_table.notes: Freestanding or built-in; height may be 34.5 in when recessed; some sloped fronts; some stackable.

combo_washer_dryer_table.notes: Some models suitable for undercounter installation.

kitchen_laundry.dwelling_note: Laundry placed adjacent to kitchen; keep dryer vented.

separate_laundry_rooms_A.notes: Four corridor/U/L examples with vents at dryers; home freezer may substitute for ironer.

separate_laundry_rooms_B.notes: U- and L-shaped rooms; cabinets/shelves above; chute empties onto counter when bottom is released.

laundry_sewing_room.note: Home freezer may substitute for ironer.

laundry_playroom.barrier: folding_gate between laundry and play space

provenance.raw_text: Minimum clearance between opposite counters with appliances: 42"
Minimum clearance when two people work at same time: 48"
Minimum width of passage (no work): 38"
Space for one worker: 27" width x 30" depth
Space in front of drawer to opposite: 38"; drawer projects ~18"
Range clear counter each side 21"
Refrigerator landing area 16" (latch side)
Mix center 28" if adjacent to another counter
Serve center 36" counter
Adjacent counter to sink 18" min
Normal working area (horizontal) 48"
Highest shelf fully visible 61"
Without obstruction 72"
Mix-center counter height 32"
Bottom of sink 32 1/2"
Comfortable working height at wall oven 32"–34"
Spacing of shelving by shelf depth (4–6in→5in, 6–10→6, 10–15→7, 15–24→10)
Exhaust fan: minimum capacity 15 air changes per hour
Percentage distribution of trips: Sink 43–48%, Range 14–18%, Mix 12–13%, Refrigerator 7–8%, Dining 6–7%, Serve 3–6%
If a dishwasher is desired, it should be located at the sink center.
Broken-U plans; dashed work flow; DW at sink center.
L-shaped plans; DW at sink center.
Kitchen plans with wall oven; DW at sink center.
All sinks 36 in high; backsplash varies 3–4 in.
Single-bowl widths 54–96; double-bowl widths 60–96.
Rim 1–1½ in; bowl size tables for triple/double/single and round bowls.
Dims for combo, freestanding, under-counter; open-door depths.
Electric surface burner module sizes and control positions.
Wall oven sizes; microwave combinations available.
Gas/electric range widths/heights; 40" ranges generally two ovens.
Under-counter built-in refrigerator sizes by capacity.
Capacity vs dimensions vs door-clearance.
Capacity vs dimensions; door-clearance where given.
Capacity vs dimensions; door-clearance where given.
Built-in freezer example 6 cu ft 24D x 36W x 42H.
Example built-in RF 24D x 36W x 74H ≈13 cu ft.
Wall-hung/built-in RF: 11 cu ft 18D x 64W x 40H (3 doors); 13 cu ft 24D x 60W x 38H (2 doors).
Combination/executive/special utility/pullman/auto appliance center sizes and features.
Wood cabinets: base 34½" high (no top), 36" with top, 24" deep; wall 13" deep.
Wall/base cabinet matrices; single-door corner; drawers; widths/heights as dot tables.
Metal cabinets: same base height/depth; total counter depth 25"; wall 13" deep; right/left doors; options.
No. of drawers vs widths: 2→15–24; 3→27–39; 4→42–48.
Hood widths 24/30/36/42; door counts 2 or 2–4; some with no projecting hood.
Corner/half-round/quarter-round/island/under-sink/blind-corner; widths listed; sink-front heights 34½".
Order: hamper→sort/pre-treat→washer→tray→dryer→ironing/hanging→storage.
Washer/dryer tables; door-opening clearance 40–44"; ironing board 54" board in 6' envelope; ironer station sizes, overall 7'-2".
Top-opening washer: 26" deep, 27" front clearance; worker's clearance width ~4'-8".
Front-opening washer: 26" deep, 35" front clearance; worker's clearance width ~5'-1".
Hinged-door dryer: 26" deep, 36" front clearance; worker's clearance width ~5'-2".
Slant-front drop-door dryer: 26" deep, 33" front clearance; worker's clearance width ~4'-11".
Stacked washer/dryer: worker's clearance width ~5'-3"; clearances 37" at upper, 26" at lower.
Straight-line washer + dryer: worker's clearance width ~5'-2"; 36" at dryer, 26" at washer.
Key for laundry plans.
Separate laundry rooms; vents noted; freezer may substitute for ironer.
U/L rooms; cabinets/storage above; chute empties to counter.
Laundry with sewing/breakfast/play; folding gate shown.
